formdata.value: {"CONTACT_INFO":{"EMAIL":"organizer@example.com","MOBILE_NUMBER":9876543210},"DESCRIPTION":"An exciting gaming tournament for amateur and pro gamers alike.","EVENT_DATE":{"$date":"2025-05-20T14:00:00Z"},"EVENT_NAME":"Spring Gaming Bash","REGISTRATION_DEADLINE":{"$date":"2025-05-10T23:59:59Z"},"VENUE":"Neon Arena, Sector 21, Game City","ELIGIBILITY":["18+","Must bring valid ID"],"GAME_TYPE":"Battle Royale","GAME":"Fortnite","CONSOLE":"PlayStation 5","PRIZE_POOL":"$5000","LOCATION":"Online & Offline Hybrid","FORMAT":"Knockout","FAQ":[{"QUESTION":"What is the prize pool?","ANSWER":"$5000"},{"QUESTION":"How many players per team?","ANSWER":"4"}],"NUMBER_OF_MEMBERS":4,"NUMBER_OF_TEAMS":16,"ORGANIZER":"organizer-uuid","STATUS":"UPCOMING","QUESTIONNAIRE":[],"REGISTRATIONS":[],"SPONSORSHIP_TIERS":[{"TIER_NAME":"Gold","PRICE":1000,"BENEFITS":["Logo on stream","Social media shoutouts"]},{"TIER_NAME":"Silver","PRICE":500,"BENEFITS":["Logo on stream"]}],"SOCIAL_LINKS":{"DISCORD":"discord.gg/event","TWITTER":"@eventhandle"}}
